title: TATOEBA DATA PIPELINE AND LICENSING
description: Enhance Tatoeba pipeline to produce game-ready data, add proper licensing attribution, and create static JSON files for new game modes.

tasks.title: Enhance Tatoeba Pipeline with Filtering and Grouping
tasks.description: Update download_tatoeba.py to filter sentences by difficulty, group by theme, and output structured JSON files for game use. This is data processing work that runs in Python environment.

subtasks.title: Add difficulty estimation to Tatoeba pipeline
subtasks.description: Estimate CEFR level based on: Sentence word count (1-4 words → A1, 5-8 → A2, 9+ → B1), Vocabulary frequency (using frequency data if available), Grammar complexity indicators (subjunctive, conditionals → B1+). Add 'level' field to each sentence: 'A1' | 'A2' | 'B1'.

subtasks.title: Add theme grouping to pipeline
subtasks.description: Create theme categories: greetings, food, travel, family, work, leisure, etc. Use keyword matching to assign themes. Allow sentence to have multiple themes. Add 'themes' array field to each sentence.

subtasks.title: Create SentenceGroup output format
subtasks.description: Group sentences by theme and level. Output structure: { id: string, theme: string, level: 'A1' | 'A2' | 'B1', sentences: Sentence[], wordCount: number (average) }. Generate output files per theme.

subtasks.title: Generate static JSON output files
subtasks.description: Create output directory: svelte/static/sentences/. Generate sentences/index.json (manifest of all groups). Generate sentences/themes/*.json (sentences grouped by theme). Ensure files are small enough for efficient loading (<500KB each).

subtasks.title: Create pipeline tests
subtasks.description: Test difficulty estimation logic. Test theme assignment. Test output file generation. Test deduplication.

testing: Verify output files are generated correctly

tasks.title: Generate Lesson Definition Files
tasks.description: Create lesson definitions for "Valitut sanat" game mode. Lessons combine vocabulary words with example sentences from Tatoeba.

subtasks.title: Create lesson generation script
subtasks.description: Create: scripts/data_pipeline/generate_lessons.py. Input: vocabulary categories from words.ts, Tatoeba sentences. Output: lesson JSON files with word-sentence pairings. Lesson structure: { id: string, category: string, tier: number (1 = most common, 2 = less common), words: string[] (word IDs), phrases: string[] (sentence IDs from Tatoeba) }

subtasks.title: Match vocabulary words to Tatoeba sentences
subtasks.description: For each word in vocabulary database: Find Tatoeba sentences containing that word, Select sentences appropriate for word's CEFR level, Limit to 2-3 example sentences per word. Handle words with no matching sentences gracefully.

subtasks.title: Split large categories into tiers
subtasks.description: Categories with >15 words split into tiers by frequency. Tier 1: most common words (first lesson). Tier 2: less common words (second lesson). Example: verbs-1.json (common verbs), verbs-2.json (less common).

subtasks.title: Generate lesson output files
subtasks.description: Create output: svelte/static/lessons/. Generate lessons/index.json (manifest of all lessons). Generate individual lesson files: lessons/*.json.

testing: Verify output files contain valid data

tasks.title: Add Tatoeba License Attribution
tasks.description: Add proper CC-BY 2.0 FR attribution for Tatoeba corpus. Update licenses data, tietoja page, and repository files.

subtasks.title: Update licenses.ts with Tatoeba
subtasks.description: Add Tatoeba entry to licenses data: { name: "Tatoeba Sentence Corpus", source: "https://tatoeba.org", license: "CC-BY 2.0 FR", description: "Trilingual sentence pairs for language learning", attribution: "Sentences from Tatoeba.org contributors" }

subtasks.title: Update tietoja page with Tatoeba attribution
subtasks.description: Add Tatoeba section to /tietoja page. Display license information clearly. Link to original Tatoeba source. Include proper attribution text as required by CC-BY.

subtasks.title: Update repository LICENSE or NOTICES file
subtasks.description: Add Tatoeba to NOTICES file or create one. Document all third-party licenses in one place.

subtasks.title: Add license headers to relevant source files
subtasks.description: Add comment at top of sentence-related files noting Tatoeba license. Files: sentenceLoader.ts, lesson-related files.

testing: Manual: View /tietoja page, verify Tatoeba attribution displays

tasks.title: Create Sentence and Lesson Loader Services
tasks.description: Create TypeScript services for loading sentence and lesson data in the Svelte app. These services handle fetching, caching, and providing data to game modes.

subtasks.title: Create sentenceLoader service
subtasks.description: Create: svelte/src/lib/services/sentenceLoader.ts. Functions: loadSentenceIndex(): Promise<SentenceGroupManifest>, loadSentenceGroup(groupId: string): Promise<SentenceGroup>, getSentencesByTheme(theme: string): Promise<Sentence[]>, getSentencesByLevel(level: CEFRLevel): Promise<Sentence[]>. Implement in-memory caching for loaded groups. TypeScript interfaces for sentence data.

subtasks.title: Create lessonService
subtasks.description: Create: svelte/src/lib/services/lessonService.ts. Functions: loadLessonIndex(): Promise<LessonManifest>, loadLesson(lessonId: string): Promise<Lesson>, getLessonsByCategory(category: string): Promise<Lesson[]>. Implement caching. TypeScript interfaces for lesson data.

subtasks.title: Create lessonProgress store
subtasks.description: Create: svelte/src/lib/stores/lessonProgress.ts. Track lesson completion per user. Store in localStorage. Interface: { lessonId: string, completedAt: string, wordScores: Record<string, number>, nextReviewAt: string }

subtasks.title: Add service tests
subtasks.description: Test sentenceLoader fetch and cache behavior. Test lessonService loading and filtering. Mock fetch for testing.
